body:
Hey!
So I have noticed a thing; Donators and Staff members can´t to /fly on the lobby, one thing that i don´t understand, since imo, They could do that, and there is one more feature to add on the Donator packages

What do you think?



IStrafeer_,
Avicus Livestreamer
body_tagged:
Hey!
So I have noticed a thing; Donators and Staff members can´t to /fly on the lobby, one thing that i don´t understand, since imo, They could do that, and there is one more feature to add on the Donator packages

title: Donator/Staff /fly issue.

replies.body:
I honestly think it would be abused. As a non-donator, I really do see this feature destined for more bad than good.

Also, it might cause severe lag and it's just a bragging right to non-donators.
replies.body_tagged:
I honestly think it would be abused. As a non-donator, I really do see this feature destined for more bad than good.

Also, it might cause severe lag and it's just a bragging right to non-donators.

replies.body: In the update, there would be "wings" that you can buy in the credit shop, and you'd be able to fly in the lobby with that.
replies.body_tagged: In the update, there would be "wings" that you can buy in the credit shop, and you'd be able to fly in the lobby with that.

replies.body: Yeah, like Hack said, you'll be able to buy it in the update. (You really are proud of that livestreamer position :P, congrats)
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, like Hack said, you'll be able to buy it in the update. (You really are proud of that livestreamer position :P, congrats)

replies.body: <u></u>Donators and staff used to be able to fly around the lobby by default. Should definitely be brought back.
replies.body_tagged: <u></u>Donators and staff used to be able to fly around the lobby by default. Should definitely be brought back.

replies.body: Yes, :P, First Rank On Avicus :P and thanks

replies.body: This is less likely but people could be flying around and other might think they are hacking or people might abuse it like find a glitch to get out the lobby or something along those lines :)

replies.body: There is parkour in the lobby, and if they add rewards for completing it, that makes it super hard. Look at Mineplex parkour, it is so easily abused and cheated on.
